description:
Weekly-game-jam-week #148


Story

The foolish mortals have built a vast and rich kingdom, ripe for the picking. Become a reflection of their darkest desires. Steal their faces and their powers and end all who stand before you. Slay the king and claim the throne.

Controls

Move = WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot = Mouse click (fires towards mouse location)

Shapeshift = Space (transforms into enemy at mouse location)
Note: be sure to get close to the enemy that you want to Shapeshift for before pressing the space button

Shift = Special Ability (dependent on form)
Note:The player can not shoot before it Shapeshifts to some wizard
